In May 2004, when Bush visited the Pentagon and then repaired to Donald Rumsfeld 's office, the secretary handed him yet another I-quit letter. I have concluded that the damage from the acts of abuse that happened on my watch, by individuals for whose conduct I am ultimately responsible, can best be responded to by my resignation, it said.
